properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 21 at 2:42AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 6 to 9 ft expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 4 to 7 ft expected.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM this afternoon to noon
EST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM EST
this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY
